str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
